duties_responsibilities.duty: Author technical design documents, test plans, and release plans for Workday integration solutions.
Configure, build, test, and deploy Workday integration solutions.
Resolve integration issues requiring in-depth expertise with Workday.
Partner with IT and business teams on Workday solutions within the integration space.
Communicate with various levels of management and collaborate with a matrix team of professionals.
Provide expertise in integrating solutions using SOAP and REST APIs, XML, and XSLT.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field of study or equivalent relevant experience in programming
